languages.text: "Однако, мутанты... мутанты — это интересно. Жжешь их, жжешь, а они снова заводятся! Ну спасибо вам невероятное за помощь и сведения. Футфол не забудет. А мы с ребятами сходим в логово, приберемся — чтобы точно заразы не осталось!"

"Mutants, is it? Hmm... Funny thing about mutants — you keep burning them, and they just keep popping up! Well, thank you kindly for the help and the details. Footfall won't forget it. Me and the lads will drop by their lair and clean up, make sure there's no disease left!"
languages.original_text: "Однако, мутанты... мутанты — это интересно. Жжешь их, жжешь, а они снова заводятся! Ну спасибо вам невероятное за помощь и сведения. Футфол не забудет. А мы с ребятами сходим в логово, приберемся — чтобы точно заразы не осталось!"

traits.locale_text: "Mutants, then, look at that... Mutants are interesting. You keep burning them, and they just keep appearing! Well, thank you kindly for the help and the details. Footfall won't forget it. Me and the lads will go to their lair and clean up — make sure there's no disease left!"

"Mutants, then, look at that... Mutants are interesting. You keep burning them, and they just keep appearing! Well, thank you kindly for the help and the details. Footfall won't forget it. Me and the lads will go to their lair and clean up — make sure there's no disease left!"

"Mutants, is it? Hmm... Funny thing about mutants — you keep burning them, and they just keep popping up! Well, thank you kindly for the help and the details. Footfall won't forget it. Me and the lads will drop by their lair and clean up, make sure there's no disease left!"

"Mutants, is it? Hmm... Funny thing about mutants — you keep burning them, and they just keep popping up! Well, thank you kindly for the help and the details. Footfall won't forget it. Me and the lads will drop by their lair and clean up, make sure there's no disease left!"

"Mutants, is it? Hmm... Funny thing about mutants — you keep burning them, and they just keep popping up! Well, thank you kindly for the help and the details. Footfall won't forget it. Me and the lads will drop by their lair and clean up, make sure there's no disease left!"

languages.text: “变种人，是吗？嗯……变种人很有意思，你一刻不停地烧他们，可他们总是一刻不停地往外冒！很好，谢谢你的帮助，也谢谢你告诉我们这些细节。落脚港不会忘记你的恩情。我和我的小伙子们打算去一趟他们的巢穴，清理一下，确保把所有疾病都消灭干净！”
languages.original_text: "Mutants, is it? Hmm... Funny thing about mutants — you keep burning them, and they just keep popping up! Well, thank you kindly for the help and the details. Footfall won't forget it. Me and the lads will drop by their lair and clean up, make sure there's no disease left!"

traits.locale_text: “变种人，是吗？嗯……变种人很有意思，你一刻不停地烧他们，可他们总是一刻不停地往外冒！很好，谢谢你的帮助，也谢谢你告诉我们这些细节。落脚港不会忘记你的恩情。我和我的小伙子们打算去一趟他们的巢穴，清理一下，确保把所有疾病都消灭干净！”

languages.text: «¿Mutantes, dice? Es curioso lo de los mutantes: por mucho que los quememos, ¡siempre aparecen más! En fin, gracias por la ayuda y la información. En Paso no lo olvidaremos. Los muchachos y yo nos pasaremos por su guarida a hacer limpieza, ¡para que no quede ni rastro de la enfermedad!».
languages.original_text: "Mutants, is it? Hmm... Funny thing about mutants — you keep burning them, and they just keep popping up! Well, thank you kindly for the help and the details. Footfall won't forget it. Me and the lads will drop by their lair and clean up, make sure there's no disease left!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Mutantes, dice? Es curioso lo de los mutantes: por mucho que los quememos, ¡siempre aparecen más! En fin, gracias por la ayuda y la información. En Paso no lo olvidaremos. Los muchachos y yo nos pasaremos por su guarida a hacer limpieza, ¡para que no quede ni rastro de la enfermedad!».

languages.text: 「変異体ですか？うーん…おかしな話ですね…いくら燃やしても、次々と顔を出す！そうだ、ご親切に教えていただいた上に、協力までしていただきありがとうございます。フットフォールはこのことを忘れません。私と仲間達が巣窟に立ち寄って、病気が残ってないか確認します！」
languages.original_text: "Mutants, is it? Hmm... Funny thing about mutants — you keep burning them, and they just keep popping up! Well, thank you kindly for the help and the details. Footfall won't forget it. Me and the lads will drop by their lair and clean up, make sure there's no disease left!"

traits.locale_text: 「変異体ですか？うーん…おかしな話ですね…いくら燃やしても、次々と顔を出す！そうだ、ご親切に教えていただいた上に、協力までしていただきありがとうございます。フットフォールはこのことを忘れません。私と仲間達が巣窟に立ち寄って、病気が残ってないか確認します！」

languages.text: "Mutanten, ach was? Hmm ... Das Witzige an Mutanten ist ... man verbrennt sie, und sie kommen einfach wieder! Wie auch immer, danke für die Hilfe und die Info. Footfall wird Euch das nicht vergessen. Ich und die Jungs machen in deren Bau noch ein wenig sauber, damit wirklich keine Krankheit mehr übrig ist!"
languages.original_text: "Mutants, is it? Hmm... Funny thing about mutants — you keep burning them, and they just keep popping up! Well, thank you kindly for the help and the details. Footfall won't forget it. Me and the lads will drop by their lair and clean up, make sure there's no disease left!"

traits.locale_text: "Mutanten, ach was? Hmm ... Das Witzige an Mutanten ist ... man verbrennt sie, und sie kommen einfach wieder! Wie auch immer, danke für die Hilfe und die Info. Footfall wird Euch das nicht vergessen. Ich und die Jungs machen in deren Bau noch ein wenig sauber, damit wirklich keine Krankheit mehr übrig ist!"

languages.text: « Des mutants, hein ? Hmm... Ce qui est marrant avec les mutants, c'est qu'on a beau les faire cramer, il en vient toujours plus ! Enfin bon, merci beaucoup pour votre aide et pour les infos. Castel l'oubliera pas de sitôt. On va aller nettoyer leur repaire avec mes gars, histoire d'être sûrs que la maladie est bien éradiquée ! »
languages.original_text: "Mutants, is it? Hmm... Funny thing about mutants — you keep burning them, and they just keep popping up! Well, thank you kindly for the help and the details. Footfall won't forget it. Me and the lads will drop by their lair and clean up, make sure there's no disease left!"

traits.locale_text: « Des mutants, hein ? Hmm... Ce qui est marrant avec les mutants, c'est qu'on a beau les faire cramer, il en vient toujours plus ! Enfin bon, merci beaucoup pour votre aide et pour les infos. Castel l'oubliera pas de sitôt. On va aller nettoyer leur repaire avec mes gars, histoire d'être sûrs que la maladie est bien éradiquée ! »

languages.text: "Mutantlar demek? Hımm... Onlar da bir garip, yaktıkça daha fazlası peyda oluyor! Yardımlarınız ve verdiğiniz bilgiler için teşekkür ederim. Binliman bunu unutmayacak. Bizimkilerle inlerine dalıp etrafın son bir tozunu alalım ki hastalığın kökü kurusun!"
languages.original_text: "Mutants, is it? Hmm... Funny thing about mutants — you keep burning them, and they just keep popping up! Well, thank you kindly for the help and the details. Footfall won't forget it. Me and the lads will drop by their lair and clean up, make sure there's no disease left!"

traits.locale_text: "Mutantlar demek... Hımm... Mutantlar da bir garip, yaktıkça daha fazlası çıkıyor ortaya! Yardımlarınız ve her şey için teşekkür ederim. Binliman bunu unutmayacak. Bizimkilerle inlerine uğrayıp son bir tozunu alalım etrafın!"
